programme.title: The failed coup against Manuel Noriega
programme.short_synopsis: Is American intervention in Panama inevitable after a failed coup?
programme.medium_synopsis: The failure of the coup against General Manuel Noriega of Panama, the involvement of the Bush administration in the attempted takeover and the possibility of American intervention.
